verbs.description: [ARG0: South Korea 's president] [V: urged] [ARG1: North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG2: to present a plan with concrete steps toward denuclearization , raising the pressure on its leader , Kim Jong Un , during his visit to Beijing to discuss the outcome of his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump] .

South Korea 's president urged [ARG0: North Korea] on Wednesday to [V: present] [ARG1: a plan] [ARGM-MNR: with concrete steps toward denuclearization] , raising the pressure on its leader , Kim Jong Un , during his visit to Beijing to discuss the outcome of his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump .

South Korea 's president urged [ARG0: North Korea] on Wednesday to present a plan with concrete steps toward denuclearization , [V: raising] [ARG1: the pressure on its leader , Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-TMP: during his visit to Beijing to discuss the outcome of his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump] .

South Korea 's president urged North Korea on Wednesday to present a plan with concrete steps toward denuclearization , raising the pressure on its leader , Kim Jong Un , during his visit to Beijing to [V: discuss] [ARG1: the outcome of his summit with U.S. President Donald Trump] .
